name: Five nights at frobo's
description:
Have you ever wanted to play a real shitty remake of five nights at freddy's? no? well that's too bad!

Five night's at frobo's is a game where you work at the amazing frobo's food and shit co, trying to get some money to survive the days, and trying to survive the night from the, very heavy, paper thin (except one) aminatronics (yeah they're called that, don't ask why).

if you feel like wasting some minutes (maybe an hour I dunno), then step right in into this quite literal shit show!
